description: Triangle T(n,k) of number of unilaterally connected digraphs on n unlabeled nodes with k arcs, k=0..n*(n-1).
references: F. Harary and E. M. Palmer, Graphical Enumeration, Academic Press, NY, 1973.
links: R. W. Robinson, Counting strong digraphs (research announcement), J. Graph Theory 1, 1977, pp. 189-190.
crossrefs: Row sums give A003088. Cf. A057271-A057279.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Aug 23 2000
